name: NIGHT FALLEN
description: Night Fallen is an Open World, First-Person Action Horror Game with Stealth and RPG mechanics. Set in a small remote forest of the United Kingdom, a horde of other worldly have taken hold. It's time to fight back!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 64-bits Processor: Intel i7 4790k Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 64-bits Processor: Intel i7 7700k Memory: 12 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD equivalent DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 4 GB available space Sound Card: Compatible Sound Card
